author: hqucms
body:
#### PR description:

Rework of https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/46153. 
The updated model file is in https://github.com/cms-data/PhysicsTools-NanoAOD/pull/18.

> PR description:
> 
> This PR adds ParticleNet-based Muon ID for NanoAODv15.
> The feature was discussed during Muon POG meeting [(23/09/2024)](https://indico.cern.ch/event/1457874/) and it will be discussed during XPOG meeting [(2/10/2024)](https://indico.cern.ch/event/1462345/)
> 

#### PR validation:

`runTheMatrix.py -w nano --ibeos -l 2500.211`
title: [NanoAOD] Add ParticleNet-based Muon ID (Rework of #46153)
